mapper.insert: INSERT INTO skd_sel_test_case_input ( scnrio_num , case_num , input_num , eff_end_dtm , audit_num , audit_dtm , input_val , eff_sta_dtm ) SELECT sstci1.scnrio_num AS scnrio_num , sstci1.case_num AS case_num , #{input_num} AS input_num , '9999-12-31 23:59:59' AS eff_end_dtm , #{user_num} AS audit_num , NOW() AS audit_dtm , sstci1.input_val AS input_val , #{system_call_dtm} AS eff_sta_dtm FROM skd_sel_test_input ssti1 , skd_sel_test_case_input sstci1 WHERE ssti1.scnrio_num = #{scnrio_num} AND ssti1.input_nm = #{input_nm} AND ssti1.eff_end_dtm = (SELECT MAX(ssti2.eff_end_dtm) FROM skd_sel_test_input ssti2 WHERE ssti2.scnrio_num = ssti1.scnrio_num AND ssti2.input_nm = ssti1.input_nm ) AND sstci1.scnrio_num = ssti1.scnrio_num AND sstci1.input_num = ssti1.input_num AND ssti1.eff_end_dtm BETWEEN sstci1.eff_sta_dtm AND sstci1.eff_end_dtm

INSERT INTO skd_sel_test_scnrio ( scnrio_num , eff_end_dtm , audit_num , audit_dtm , scnrio_nm , op_typ_num , scnrio_desc , seq_num , src_cd , eff_sta_dtm ) SELECT ssts.scnrio_num AS scnrio_num , '9999-12-31 23:59:59' AS eff_end_dtm , #{user_num} AS audit_num , NOW() AS audit_dtm , ssts.scnrio_nm AS scnrio_nm , ssts.op_typ_num AS op_typ_num , ssts.scnrio_desc AS scnrio_desc , seq_num AS seq_num , #{src_cd} AS src_cd , #{system_call_dtm} AS eff_sta_dtm FROM skd_sel_test_scnrio ssts WHERE ssts.scnrio_num = #{scnrio_num} AND ssts.eff_end_dtm = (SELECT MAX(eff_end_dtm) FROM skd_sel_test_scnrio ssts2 WHERE ssts2.scnrio_num = ssts.scnrio_num )
